quotes.quote: Indifference is the invincible grant of the world.
As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us.
Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
Character is an invincible force, which acts by presence and without means.
An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
Youth is incredible because you really do feel invincible.
We are as indestructible as we believe ourselves to be.
You are bigger than your problem, stronger than your obstacles and higher than your ego.You can make a difference you are invincible.
The soul is indestructible and its activity will continue through eternity.
Faith is an invincible, impeccable, invisible, invigorating and intelligible trust that does not rust with time.
You can be invincible, if you enter into no contest in which it is not in your power to conquer.
It's the unconquerable soul of man, and not the nature of the weapon he uses, that ensures victory.
Being unconquerable lies with yourself; being conquerable lies with your enemy.
Whoever is winning at the moment will always seem to be invincible.
Nothing makes a man more invincible than to "know" that death is not the end.
The indestructible is one: it is each individual human being and, at the same time, it is common to all, hence the incomparably indivisible union that exists between human beings.
For the human soul is virtually indestructible, and its ability to rise from the ashes remains as long as the body draws breath.
Let not others define you, make yourself strong and able to define yourself. When you accept yourself with your worthiness and weakness, you are invincible.
When you're indestructible, then nothing is a threat really. So nothing needs to be taken that seriously.
No man is invincible, and therefore no man can fully understand that which would make him invincible.
Indomitable in retreat, invincible in advance; insufferable in victory.
One arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible.
In theory there is a possibility of perfect happiness: To believe in the indestructible element within one, and not to strive towards it.
The V sign is the symbol of the unconquerable will of the occupied territories, and a portent of the fate awaiting the Nazi tyranny.
Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
Even in its darkest passages, the heart is unconquerable. It is important that the body survives, but it is more meaningful that the human spirit prevails.
No civilization, no matter how mighty it may appear to itself, is indestructible.
The most vulnerable and yet most unconquerable of things is human vanity; nay, through being wounded its strength increases and can grow to giant proportions.
Value is the most invincible and impalpable of ghosts, and comes and goes unthought of, while the visible and dense matter remains as it was.
